name: Woo Button Text
author: Rupom Khondaker

sections.description:
Woo Button Text Changer can change woocommerce button text globally. You can change button name from WordPress admin panel. and also change the color, shape , and styles also special of related product remove from single product page.

Docs & Support

VIsit: http://www.exclutips.com/plugins/woo-button-text/

Recommended Plugins

The following are other recommended plugin for Woo Button Text Changer.

Woo Commerce https://wordpress.org/plugins/woocommerce/
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire ‘woo-button-text’ folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

You will find ‘Woo Button Text’ menu in your WordPress admin panel under Settings menu.

For basic usage, you can also have a look at the http://www.exclutips.com/plugins/woo-button-text/
sections.faq:
Do you have questions or issues with Woo Button Text Changer ? Use these support channels appropriately.
http://www.exclutips.com/plugins/woo-button-text/

Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the entire ‘woo-button-text’ folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

You will find ‘Woo Button Text’ menu in your WordPress admin panel under Settings menu.

For basic usage, you can also have a look at the http://www.exclutips.com/plugins/woo-button-text/

short_description: Simple WooCommerce button text changer / Styler / add to cart text changer for WooCommerce.
description:
Woo Button Text Changer can change woocommerce button text globally. You can change button name from WordPress admin panel. and also change the color, shape , and styles also special of related product remove from single product page.

Docs & Support
